Articles.Content:
I installed the Stock Fuel Switch mod, which is lovely but only works in the VAB. What I'd like to be able to do is take a rocket fuel tank and, either when one resource is drained or after dumping it, reassign the volume for one fuel to bolster the other.

Chiefly this would be useful for launching a tank as a conventional rocket stage and then reassigning it to fuel an LV-N. Empty out the Oxidizer and replace it with Liquid Fuel. Or even Monopropellant!

Admittedly, in reality it would probably cause an explosion, but I don't think that matters for the game.
